context.description: Checks whether the current base image version(s) running on hosts in the cluster can be successfully upgraded to the base image defined in the desired image of the cluster.

nestedErrors.message: Software compatibility cannot be determined for release 9.1.0.0.24852909, 9.1.0.0.24859234. It can be either a security patch or an out-of-date compatibility data bundle having timestamp 2025-01-21T16:14:55.181000. Firstly, please ensure the software compatibility data bundle is up-to-date. Please note that no software compatibility checks are performed on security patches.
nestedErrors.remediationMessage: Sync or upload up-to-date compatibility data bundle from Lifecycle Manager.
